Attaching new stream visualizers to existing
sources allows viewing of all historical data
and a QueueView to an internal list
StreamControl: Handles the invocation of new stream sources.
A stream source must be associated with a data source. The streamcontrol
handles data dispatch, and guarantees uniqueness in data rx.
takes care of wiring them up
Has a lot of the messy glue logic
such that a WaveWin and a triggerWin can be
passed a Vis control and will perform
